Docs.summary: Creates and provides information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] serializers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter CreateSerializerWriter(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

Docs.param: The output stream that the returned serializer is to write to.
Docs.summary: Creates a that outputs [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content to a specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
Docs.returns: An output writer that serializes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content to the specified .

Docs.summary: Gets the standard file name extension for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documents.
Docs.value: The standard file name extension (including the leading period) for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method always returns the string ".xps".

Docs.summary: Gets the public name for the serializers that the factory produces.
Docs.value: The public name for serializers that the factory produces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method always returns the string "XPS Serializer".

Docs.summary: Gets the manufacturer's name for serializers that the factory produces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method always returns the string "Microsoft".

Docs.summary: Gets the manufacturer's Web address for serializers that the factory produces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method always returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] "http://www.microsoft.com".
